titles.title: A bill to authorize the granting of diplomatic and consular privileges and immunities to offices of the Commission of the European Communities which are established in the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations requested executive comment from State Department.

bill.summary: 6/5/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the President to grant diplomatic and consular privileges and immunities to offices of the Commission of the European Communities which are established in the United States.
